site_name: Former 79-83 ODDS, Kenton Road, Harrow, HA3 0AH
description: Variation of condition 2 (approved drawings/documents) relating to changes to the design post-construction of Variation of Conditions reference 21/4297 dated 25 February, 2022, for Variation of condition 32 (the development shall provide 39 self-contained flats (27 x 1bed, 8 x 2bed and 4 x 3bed) to be used as residential units (Use Class C3) as shown on the approved plans, to allow:Extension of Unit 39 comprising an increase from a 1-bedroom flat to a 2-bedroom flat. Inclusion of new 1-bedroom flat (Unit 40). Minor amendments to the building's elevations. of full planning permission reference 17/3717 dated 15 May 2018 for demolition of existing dwellinghouse and erection of a part three part four storey building comprising self-contained flats with associated basement car and cycle parking spaces accessed via new crossover off Rushout Avenue, bin stores, fencing and landscaping, subject to a Deed of Agreement dated 15 May 2018 under Section 106 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended√ø (and subsequent minor material amendment application references: 19/4473 and 20/0685, and non-material amendment application reference 21/2521 together with subsequent Deed of Variation dated 29th October 2020).
